title: JSON schema for Z-Uno configuration file

sketch.description: The main sketch file for Z-Uno to be used

port.description: Serial port through which the sketch and bootloader will be loaded

frequency.description: Radio frequency on which the sketch will work, by default: 'EU' - 'Europe'

security.description: Security mode in which the sketch will work, by default: disabled

cppIgnored.description: If enabled, then errors in the settings for IntelliSense
